Object Parameters: Sec until it shakes in seconds at 150cc and mirror mode (starts 4 seconds before in-game timer)
Time it shakes in seconds at 150cc and mirror mode
Time until it shakes in seconds at 100cc (already starts 4 seconds before in-game timer)
Time it shakes in seconds at 100cc
Time until it shakes in seconds at 50cc and battle (already starts 4 seconds before in-game timer)
Time it shakes in seconds at 50cc and battle
Time in frames between shaking and falling (always 30 frames on GV)
Description:
Floating, shaking and sinking driveable rock from Grumble Volcano.
Slot [[Slot#3.4|3.4]] enables its SFX
The normal KCL file is always active, KCL b activates when the rock starts shaking and falls with the rock, KCL c activates when the rock starts to fall (It stays in place while the rock falls)
